name: Imperator: Rome - Deluxe Edition
summary:
Imperator: Rome Base Game 
Pre-order Bonus: Epirus Flavor Pack 
- Unique Army Model for Epirus 
- Unique Ship Model for Epirus 
- Special Epirote Monument 
- 6 Event Chains 
- One new music track 
Hellenistic World Flavor Pack 
- 4 New Army Models 
- 4 New Ship Models 
- Special On Map Monuments 
- Six Hellenistic Flavor Events 
- Alexander’s Body Event Chain 
- New Event Art 
- New music 
Digital Art Book 
Wallpaper
